description: Contains patient-level flags that impact claims derivation

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: DERIVE_TXP_PAT_YN
columns.description:
Determines whether the patient currently is known to have any claims marked as derivation transplant claims in CLM 18627.


May contain organization-specific values: No

No


Yes
